Summary
Microsoft certified MS SQL Senior Database Administrator at Ethiopian Commodity Exchange with a
demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in Database
Administration, Computer Networking, Technical Support, and Windows Server System Administration. with
extensive experience designing, coding, testing, and supporting next-generation database solutions in SQL
Server environments. Proficient in an assortment of technologies, including Access, MS SQL Server 2008 - 2019,
MYSQL, JDBC, Windows Server, Linux.
